start.text: Your 'Ecology balance simulation' shows that the current balance in the area of your species is lower than estimated. - You think that your deployed drones are disturbing local wildlife, maybe a stealth upgrade for the drones could be a good idea. You could order it right away and hope for a fast delivery.

choices.text: “Oh, there is a discount on the MIL-SPEC model! This module is even invisible to most sensors and emits customizable noise-canceling waves!“ [300 €€€]
“WHAT?! All that money for a basic sound emitter and a smart holographic display, this is a scam! The cheapest one, used, on a weird discount platform, will do just fine.“ [95 €€€]
“I'm not sure the simulation is even well calibrated, better spend money elsewhere.“

major_drone_upgrade.text: The drone stealth upgrade arrived, you start deploying it, and it's so satisfying to manipulate such quality product - With some tests trying different combinations, you notice that some local species you thought were fearful by nature, were actually terrified about the atrocious sound the drones were making! - The upgrade had a better positive impact on the ecology than expected! “I knew this beautiful piece of hardware would not fail me.“

minor_drone_upgrade.text: The drone stealth upgrade arrived, you start deploying it, right after spending hours fighting with the installation manual - The ecology is getting better, but you're not sure why

no_drone_upgrade.text: You do not try to upgrade your drones

minor_drone_upgrade_failed.text: The drone stealth upgrade arrived, the installation manual is covered with some unknown fluids, and the module stops working after only 10 hours being deployed “These damn space scammers !!“
